website_summaries.verdict: Great for organizing small bathrooms, but let your items cool before putting them back in the holder.
pros: We love how you can hang it up or set it on surface
cons: May be too small for large hair dryers
Some have complained that the heat-resistant base doesn't do its job

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer, but not heat proof.
customer_reviews.text: As an organizer, I really like it. For holding hot tools that are cooling down, I'm disappointed. The plastic definitely would start melting with a hot curling iron inside it. I know this cause I tested it with my hot curling iron and it made a small dent in the plastic after holding it on there for a few seconds. I imagine if I left it in there for any length of time, I'd come back to find a fire hazard. I'm gonna maybe invest in a silicone wrap for it so it can be used the way I intended so I don't have hot hair tools hanging out on the counter when I'm done with them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Packer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far this caddy is great. Holds my dryer and flat iron. The only concern I have, the back seems to be a sort of thin plastic where it attaches to the wall. So if and excessive weight was put on, it might snap. But there should never be excessive weight, so there shouldn't be too much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product...If you Have a Smaller Blow Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a unit to store my hair tools & thought this would fit the bill. I was a little disappointed my blow dryer was too large to fit in the larger middle slot. However, my Xtava curling wands & Vanity Planet flat iron are housed perfectly. I love the option to sit on a flat surface or hang. I purchased another Polder Style Station with two large slots with the hopes my blow dryer will fit. I will keep you posted. F.Y.I. I rated 5 stars because the video review clearly stated "It fit most blow dryers"
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: More Durable and Larger Than I'd Expected
customer_reviews.text: There are those days when you come across something you didn't know you needed. This item has fit the bill for me. I have a very small bathroom and not a lot of storage space or wall space and this gadget does the trick by being able to hang it on my towel rack beside my sink. I have everything right beside me and when company comes over I can stow it away in my bedroom. It's VERY sturdy and I dig the ventilation for my flat iron. The 3 compartments are big so there's no problem regarding size for your items.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice caddy
customer_reviews.text: I use it exactly as pictured though I hang it over the side of a bathroom shelving unit next to my sink/vanity. The "hook" or "clip" to hang it over the side of a cabinet drawer, or in my case: the arm of a shelving unit, makes it practical without causing structural damage where you hang it. Helps clear space off the vanity for other items. Storage pocket behind the main compartments for cords works well for brushes if you have retractable cords on your hair dryer.

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this 4 3/4 stars! I love the look & quality of this. Awesome for keeping everything organized on the counter. I wish was a little more stable and less top heavy when filled. Also I’d love for a little more cord storage in the back. Other than that I’d highly recommend this product. I love keeping things organized on the counter & accessible for rushed mornings. I toss in my hot flat iron or curling iron after it’s used & helps remind me to double check I’ve powered them off when I put them away. I store my round brushes also in each cubby & my paddle brush in the back. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J&B

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This item hangs on a shelving unit I have in my bathroom. I am impressed that it holds three different hair styling tools that are all different shapes and weights. It is durable sturdy and versatile. I am really happy with this product because it has allowed me so much extra space in my cabinets. I would recommend this to anyone who needs some extra space who has a lot of styling tools with nowhere to put them.
customer_reviews.author: Lifesaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as I couldn't deal with the clutter of her hair drier and irons. This unit is a good quality unit and hold's her items perfect! She has used for a few days with no issues (and yes has put her warm curling iron in w/ no problem or melting) One thing that would be nice to include with this kit is a stopper of some sort? When you put this on the shower rod or towel rack it slides. I ended up designing a stopper that holds unit in place perfect on shower towel rack. Now unit is even Better! She's happy, Im happy no more clutter so this holder is a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: I hung mine over a towel bar, and it sits nicely against the wall. I keep blow dryer, styling brush, and curling iron in it. Someone said (in one of the reviews) that it wasn't heat resistant, but I"ve put my curling iron in right after shutting it off (so it is HOT), and no problems at all. It organized all the cords and gave me a place to store all these styling tools, so my bathroom looks neat. Got a single extension cord that matches my bathroom wall, ran that to the Style Station, and voila, neat, organized AND matchy-match!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blow dryer cord won't fit , but still a decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I give this three stars because it is a good quality item, with plenty of room to hold a hair dryer , curling iron and flat iron. However, the compartment in back to hold cords is not very big. If you have a salon-quality hair dryer with a long cord, there is not enough room to hold the cord . I wish the compartment for cords in the back was bigger, then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: thatlady

customer_reviews.title: Does its job. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I ordered this because it makes life easier but it doesn’t store as well as picture shows. I have this on my towel rack that’s mounted on my bathroom wall was the part that is supposedly for storing chords doesn’t work very well. But I still use it and it still is a better storage for my hair styling accessories than under my bathroom sink ! I just wish the chord / plug holder in the back were wider. Oh well. Glad this thing exists anyway !
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: A favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. Love that I can put away my curling iron, straightener, and blow dryer without having to worry about burning anything. Holds everything safely and neatly. Cords stay in the back. Mine is on the corner of my vanity. I decided not to attatch it to a wall. Fits nice in the corner. Thats another plus... you can put on wall or on counter top. Both work. One of my best purchases. It's all whithin reach without looking messy. And its SAFE.
customer_reviews.author: Carla O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. My husband was a big fan since he hates the cords always hanging down to the floor. My only small complaint is that the place in the back that is suppose to hold the cords is a little small. My curling iron and flat iron cords don't fit the best. I still kept it because it works great and I just toss the cords in the back of it. It may only be a problem if you hang it up. Mine is sitting on the bathroom counter. Overall, I would say its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Organize, free up counter space and hide it away after your done.
customer_reviews.text: This actually does help with space. It has three good deep sized pockets for a blow dryer, curling iron and flat iron. The back side has a pocket for your cords. It is made of a good quality plastic that easily fits over a bathroom cabinet door or even over your towel bar. My favorite things that sold me is that after you styled your hair with a flat or curling iron while HOT you can put inside one of the pockets to allow to cooling down. After your done hide it away under your bathroom cabinet freeing your counter space!
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage for three hair care appliances.  Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Is really roomy and easily holds a flat iron, a curling iron and a hair dryer. The cord storage in the back is large enough to put all the cords in if you roll them up first. I stood it on the counter, but it can be hung from a towel bar. Feels and looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! You can hang it on your wall or clip it over the towel rack, I have my hair dryer, flat iron and curlers in it, and it’s perfect! Don’t need to worry about letting them cool down before putting them away, just unplug, wind up the cord and put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Dawn-Row

customer_reviews.title: It works, but not ideal
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome way to organize those hair tools and make sure they are safe without burning anything. However there isn't enough room for the cords and mine still get tangled. Plus each item doesn't fit perfectly in the slots. I still use and like, but if you don't have the perfect size tools and if you don't have a bar to hang it on - this product doesn't work to all its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Saves space, looks great, durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bathroom counter top. I use it to store the hair dryer and two different hair straighteners. I love that the cords can be stored in the compartment attached to the back and out of the way. After I turn off the hair tools I put them away in the holders and haven't had any issues with the heat melting the plastic or mesh.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kane

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty sure going into it that the 2 inch iron ...
customer_reviews.text: This is plastic with metal baskets which meas you can use them to hold styling tools while they're hot to keep them off the countertop. I bought this for my hairdryer and two flat irons. I was pretty sure going into it that the 2 inch iron wouldn't fit and I was right. A 1 inch flat iron and probably most standard sized curing irons would fit in the two side cups without problems and the 2 inch iron does fit with the blades out so will only work for storage and not for use while its hot\in use.
customer_reviews.author: 2kwietTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but small
customer_reviews.text: The material is high quality, and would allow good air flow for cooling hot tools, but unfortunately the spaces are not very large. The center compartment barely fits a medium-sized hair dryer, and the side compartments can't fit medium or large straighteners. Ended up needing to get the next size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Raindeer

customer_reviews.title: Great practical hair styling storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair styling storage container. I use to have all of my irons on towels to prevent them from scorching my counter top, now I can easily use multiple irons without a problem. I wish the side holders were the same size as the middle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Toyn

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!! YES!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, is this the best thing i've ever bought!? i don't know! it might be!! why did i never even look for it before??? now that i've found it, there's no going back. it sits perfectly over my towel bar and holds my busted old hair dryer and two brushes (though i sometimes swap one out for a flat iron) with no fuss! the cord holder on the back is fine. not life changing or anything. but other than that, i LOOOOOOVE this contraption. photo of hair dryer for size reference. it would for sure hold something with a longer nose, but not really wider.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Riotta

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea but . . . think about the height
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be great to store my hair dryer and curling irons, which didn't fit well anywhere. But with them in the holder, the height was too high to fit on my shelf in my bathroom closet. However, I moved some stuff around and put it under the sink. It's actually handier there, so I'm now I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which I love so much because it frees up space from underneath ...
customer_reviews.text: This currently holds my straightener, dryer and curling iron, which I love so much because it frees up space from underneath my cabinet and makes it a lot easier to access my hair supplies. But I knocked one star off because the cord area in the back can often feel a bit clustered trying to grab them (not a deal breaker, but wish it had separate areas to hold cords).
customer_reviews.author: magnacarla

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little storage station for my Dear Drew and brushes
customer_reviews.text: When I find something I like, I tend to buy more of the same. I bought this one for my daughter-in-law since I own the pink version and it works great for holding a blowdryer, curling iron, and brushes. It doesn't tip over and nothing is damaged by hot tools.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie56

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but saves so much counter space
customer_reviews.text: This is hanging from my towel rack which is exactly what I was looking for. It holds all my essential tools (and cords), which keeps them off of the counter - even when hot! My husband appreciates that I no longer crowd his sink/side of the vanity. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristy McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This has enough space for my needs. I also bought the, mDesign Modern Kitchen Over Cabinet Strong Steel Towel Bar Rack - Hang on Inside or Outside of Doors - Storage and Organization for Hand, Dish, Tea Towels - 9.75" Wide, to put on my vanity cabinet door because I don't have a towel rod on the wall where do my hair. I didn't want the Style Station to scratch the cabinet door plus it fit awkward without it. The towel rack is a little longer than the station so I can have room for more styling things... I got both in white to match my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper here than The Container Store
customer_reviews.text: I originally found the on TCS's website for $25 so this was a good deal. I will say the three spots for your tools are a little small- my 2" flat iron will only fit in the center hole, meaning I have to squeeze my dryer into a side one. Just a good thing to know if you have a wide flat iron or a big curling wand. Other than that, it's very pretty and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Musick

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: My wife finds this station quite useful, instead or having her grooming tools around everywhere, now she is able to have them safely in only one place. We recommend it very much, it is sturdy, of good quality and of beautiful modern design.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get my styling tools out of a basket and into their own caddy, and this is great at a great price. I kind of wish it was lower-profile in the back, as I don't need to hang it over a towel bar, but I can get over that.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: It's great and sits on my counter well. I wish it had rubber feet or something to keep it from sliding but I can always add those myself. It holds my hairdryer, curling iron and flat iron perfectly, opening up counter space, cupboard space and making me feel better about the hot irons cooling off and not potentially burning my stinky cat who jumps up on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize hair tools!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for blow dryer, curling iron, flatiron. Area for cord storage. Can stand or hang.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Not heat proof, n
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage option but WARNING, it is not heat proof. My mother was visiting in town and put a hot curling iron in it and it melted the plastic. Disappointed in this purchase since the reason I bought it was to store a hot curling iron after use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Curling iron melts plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this for myself and daughter. So I bought two. Major design flaw is that the top rim is plastic. So while the curling iron is heating up or cooling down it melts the plastic at the top. I am kind of disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K. Neiswonger

customer_reviews.title: Impulse buy, kind of sort of doing what I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale because the drawers under the sink were bursting with my wife's hair stuff and the cables attached. It's an ok product. It holds what you want it to hold, but cable management is still kind of a pain. There's just a little section in the back to jam the cables into, and it's a little frustrating to try to make it look nice. It will hang on a bar in the bathroom, or there are mounting holes on the back so you can screw it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you leave your concentrator on your dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have a typical Conair dryer and if you like to leave your concentrator on your dryer, or heaven forbid leave a diffuser on it, it won't fit. The center hole is for just the dryer only, and not a very big dryer at that. Quality materials but very disappointed in the design.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect solution. She is able to put all of ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is starting to get into styling her hair and i was concerned she might be a little careless with where she put her supplies I wanted something that stored everything. This was the perfect solution. She is able to put all of her tools it and I don't have to worry that it will melt of catch fire. It is also very portable so she is able to easily get ready for her day in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Prefect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a towel rack right next to my sink/and plug, so I just hung this on there and it keeps my flat iron, curling iron and hair dryer off of my counter. Can't believe it took me so long to get one of these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bigbootiejudy2002

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Great for storage of tools in salon. Hung it on my salon trolly.
customer_reviews.author: Lalla D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for anything but flat irons
customer_reviews.text: I like this caddy. I was hoping to use with my hair dryer, curling iron and my flat iron, however my Chi flat iron doesn’t fit in it. Kinda bummed. But it fits hair dryer and curling irons great.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Prince

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this stand, but, unfortunately, it was too thick to go in the space I had for it. So I returned it. But it is sturdy, well-made and attractive. Just wish it had fit!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! There is a little lip that can be used to hang on something and I have it right on my bathroom cabinet. I love it because I don't have to leave my hot tools out until they cool, I can put them in the holder as soon as I finish using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Troche

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Slim Straighteners first perfect about an inch and a half do, if you have a 2inch straightener that fits perfect in the center hole and the dryer fits in that hole as well. However if you have an extra long hair curler don’t let it dry in there lol it’s designed for short or regular sized ones. But it’s no biggie it keeps it all nice and tidy
customer_reviews.author: Evely corona

customer_reviews.title: Curling and drying made easy
customer_reviews.text: I use it to store my curling iron and blow dryer and a few Combs and I mounted it on the wall near my vanity area. It is very convenient and has a hole in the back to run the cords through
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Coats

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't organize my hair tools
customer_reviews.text: Do not use it at all! Such a waste of money! Got this product to organize my hair hot tools but the wires hangs and looks messier than just placing my hair straightener, curler and hair dryer on my sink counter! Also cannot hang this as shown in pics!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Looks nice on the wall. It was a little more light weight than I expected, but its holding up just fine! Would purchase again. Nice for a quest bathroom too.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie, Boston MA

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It fits all of my products great and looks better than what I had before but I would have rated it higher if the storage space for cords was in the front rather than the back (basically on the wall), and larger.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Does what I need. Caddy in the back for the power cords is not big enough for my hair dryer cord and straightener cord but that’s not a big deal to me. Just be mindful of that so you’re not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. I had one for 9 years and I'd still have it if I hadn't pulled it on the floor when I tripped on an extension cord. I immediately bought another!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome space saver and cooling down spot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for holding my hair dryer, straightener, and round barrel brush! The cors can be hid in the back with the plugs and pulled out to use I mounted it on the wall just above an outlet and it works great to save counter space and space under the bathroom sink. It's also great for letting the straightener cool off after using it without worrying about my little girls grabbing it. The only drawback is that my concentrator attachment for my hairdryer doesn't fit so I set it on top.
customer_reviews.author: Happy. Sassy. Crafty.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This holder is really nice. Holds three styling utensils, which most women have. I like that I can put my hair dryer or flat iron in it as soon as I'm finished. It is very versatile as it can stand on it's own, be hung on a hook or on a towel bar, which is so convenient. I really like it and it's worth the price. I bought another one for a white elephant gift exchange and the recipient was excited when she saw it and she ended up keeping it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Needs more cord storage but holds up great!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed that this item is very sturdy in that it stands fine with my bulky hair dryer. However, I wish there was larger or divided cord storage in the back. The cord storage slot available seems to only fit my hair dryers cord as those are usually thicker longer cords. Therefore, my flat iron and curling iron cords are still wrapped around the irons, but they do still fit in the smaller side slots. This item is not perfect, but it does help keep these items from being in a pile in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: LRK

customer_reviews.title: Easy organization that keeps your tools convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about hiding things in plain sight. Since I seem to be some sort of curling iron flat iron hoarder, I needed a decent place to keep them organized. And this definitely works it's held up for quite a while like years! And one wasn't enough so this was actually the second one I ordered. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: ToddlersMom

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: This helps organize the bathroom counter so nicely. Its versatile with different hanging options. It's easy to get the items out of it. This is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Bobee Gour

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a must for the bathroom! Instead of burning your countertop you this. The heat resistant compartment is great. I have it hooked on the side of cabinet and that was handy to have to be able to anchor it on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: MelZ

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Problem is that the holes for the cords are not large enough for the plugs on todays dryers, flat irons or curling irons. So really organizes nothing
customer_reviews.author: Denise Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Not for hott stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for wands and hair dryers. Only sad part is that you should deff wait till things cools down before you go shoving it back in it’s home. I do wish it was more cord friendly but it keeps me organized. Also, if your like me, you have a million irons and two million blow dryers. I just wished it could fit a little more into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Needing something to help with space and organizing in my tiny bathroom. I love it! I use it for my dryer, straightener and hair brushes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Handy but BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Super functional if you have the space. It has a huge bracket on the back so you could hang it on a towel bar but this doesn't appear to be removable. So it's incredibly bulky. I would guess it stands out 10 inches from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This feels like it was made very well, and I can put my hot tools away really soon after I finish using them because of the thick metal case. There is enough space for all the items I typically use, and I love that there is a compartment at the back that can hold the cords.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Versatile but could be taller
customer_reviews.text: After an entire weekend cleaning out my bathroom cabinets and drawers, I purchased this to have a designated place for my hair tools. I like it because it's versatile - it can sit on the ground or on the counter, or it can hang on the wall or on a cabinet door. It has a place for a dryer, curling iron and flat iron. My only gripe is that my hair dryer doesn't fit when it has an extension on it. Overall, though, it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elis Law

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This holds all my styling tools without me having to wait for them to cool off. I like the way it looks, and it doesn't fall over with the weight of it all.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Decent product that came apart where the screws held it together
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as a replacement. The first one broke for no apparent reason. I’m think the Machine or person that put it together over tighten the screw holding it together. Either way after half a year or so of just sitting at the same spot it fell apart. Seems to be a decent item though.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J.

customer_reviews.title: Works but does not fit all cords
customer_reviews.text: Holds chi iron, blow dryer, and styling product. Hangs nicely on towel bar. Cords don't all fit in back compartment. My only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Size Even Greater Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Hooked on towel rack above toilet in my small apartment bathroom. Has never cracked or fallen off when bumped, not once!! I store multiple brushes in the middle (my blow dryer is old model). Holds both my small and medium curler in one side. My bulky straightener in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Hair Station
customer_reviews.text: Product works great - It's very light weight and holds perfectly your hair instruments. There's no dry power, heat resistance or warmth. Review questions need to be rewritten.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer for my hair tools has been great! It is an easy way to store everything so all the cords do not get tangled together and it keeps everything in arms reach.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and put away hair equipment while they’re still hot, this is the product you need. Heat resistance is great, don’t have to wait for it to cool down to put it away. It’s of a nice size and has good quality. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my flat iron and curling iron. Fits all 3 well. I always worry when I put my irons away, but now that it’s hanging separately on its own I feel much better. It also looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 daughters and we have curling irons, straighteners, and a blow dryer on our bathroom counter. This is a savior!!! I absolutely love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: angechriswalt

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: Heat resistance is terrible . I thought this product was going to be for when you are getting ready and you put your hot straightener or curling iron in there but no no no it melts the plastic above the metal part
customer_reviews.author: Jules-21

customer_reviews.title: Toe saver
customer_reviews.text: The bathroom off of our bedroom int he new house is a little small, so I was getting a little tired to stubbing my toe on the hairdryer consistently lying on the floor. This little number took care of that though. I bout an inexpensive 12" towel rack to hang it off of which was simple enough and now the floor is free and clear. The only mild complaint from the wife is that there is no place to hold her diffuser for the hair dryer, but that is easily stowed in a cabinet, so this model serves our purposes just fine.
customer_reviews.author: bitterpete

customer_reviews.title: and I could not recommend this product more
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most handy products I have seen in a long time. I was so excited about mine, I bought two more for my girls. This gets rid of the cord mess we all have with so many products. We use one sleeve for a brush and comb. I am a former professional organizer, and I could not recommend this product more.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Four

customer_reviews.title: Good idea for storage of hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Good idea for storage of hair dryer, curling iron ect. I had much difficulty finding something to hang it on . It's quite large and bulky. You could mount it somewhere but I didn't want to put holes in anything. It is sturdy and should hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacke

customer_reviews.title: Love the Organization for Hair Tools!
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great to store styling tools for your hair. Helps to organize and keep things like dryer, curling iron/flat iron and brushes together. Sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Movielover

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The style station is as sturdy as it looks. It came boxed in a sturdy cardboard box that you would find at the store. The mesh is solid too. There are slip holes on the back piece to attach it to the cabinet but you have to play with the screw tightness because you can't really tighten them after slipping the station into place. It has a fair amount of weight to manage the hair tools. Disclaimer: I haven't actually put my hair tools in it yet. I'm in the process of moving.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pope

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, although my Revlon One Step Dryer does not fit. I don’t hang it up but just put it under the cabinet and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Flutterby

customer_reviews.title: Saves space
customer_reviews.text: I can safely put down my hair dryer and curler . Always in reach and ready. No more juggling when doing my hair.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: and she loved it! I was able to secure it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my wife as a Mother's Day gift to help her fix the clutter mess of chords and hair equipment, and she loved it! I was able to secure it to the wall with the provided screw mounts build into the back of the unit. Very sleek and a wonderful touch to the bathroom. Now she can keep all her hair equipment in one organized spot!
customer_reviews.author: JaxStraw

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: super useful especially in college where you don’t want to damage the counters and have to pay the school more money
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought one for me as a present for our bathroom. I loved it so much I bought one for my daughter for her bathroom. She is a disorganized...'don't want to adult' 19 yr old. It actually helped her SLGHTLY keep her bathroom a little more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Lynn Serrell

customer_reviews.title: Solution to the hair tool clutter.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my daughter in law loved it. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. I was tempted to keep it for myself. I will be getting myself one in the near future though. I would recommend to others. It works well on my vanity and helps keep the hair care tools in one place, leaving less clutter and more room for other necessities. Thank you for such a great solution to a problem a lot of us have.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile. Blow dryer and two curling irons fit perfectly. It looks so much neater than having cords hanging all over the vanity!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Heat Resistance
customer_reviews.text: Twice now my daughter has left my straightener on overnight in the caddy and my hair brush in the next slot is not hot. Neither is the desk that is holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Cortni

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for months and it still looks brand new. It holds what I need to and hangs on an extra towel bar.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon999

customer_reviews.title: Organized counterspace
customer_reviews.text: My dryer, straightener & curling iron were a mess on my counters because I use them so often! Definitely helped straighten up my area I use to get ready!
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Happy
customer_reviews.text: The cord keeper in the back doesn't offer enough space for the cords. Overall, it's a good product. It looks nice on the counter top--much nicer than having the dryer and flat iron laying out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for us
customer_reviews.text: The design is too small for a standard hair dryer, and because it was so cheap we just threw it in another bathroom with brushes and freshener.
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but it sticks out too far from the wall and so it gets knocked around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: J.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! A great way to organize my hair stuff. I have it sitting on the counter....works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Great station!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! i have it hanging on a towel holding rod and love the fact that i can take out my hot iron/dryer and out it directly in this station and they will be out of the way. It hangs nicely on the rod but you can use the screws to mount it on the wall too. I just love the fact how my counter stay de-cluttered and clean now with everything going in this right after use!
customer_reviews.author: minimks

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my blow dryer, nor my straightening brush.the compartment on the back is also not big enough to hold all the cards. Not even big enough to hold one chord! A useless part of the product.
customer_reviews.author: DRV

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This item is wonderful to store my hairdryer, flat iron and curling iron. I so happy I finally decided to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Just us

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hair appliance organizer
customer_reviews.text: this product is a great way to keep hair appliances organized - and it looks great too - 2 of my friends already want one for themselves
customer_reviews.author: LISA TASCON

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room for all your gadgets
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can hang this from the towel rack in my bathroom. Saves me so much counter space. The cord wrap is a little hard to use while hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Space okay for a plain blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great overall. Just wish the dryer space was large enough to fit my dryer with the compressor attached.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Love this, hang it on my towel rack since ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this, hang it on my towel rack since I don't have much bathroom space in a 1 1/2 bedroom apartment. I love being able to have the applicances plugged in all the time, and just grab whatever I need (hair blower, curling hair blower, curling iron....superb idea!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Less Clutter
customer_reviews.text: good size looks so nice reduces clutter in bathroom. I recommend this for moms of teens.
customer_reviews.author: JEAN JORDAN

customer_reviews.title: Space saving organization
customer_reviews.text: At last! My hairdryer, curling iron and brush are neat, easy to reach... and organized. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MzCarol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect caddy! I have it at school and it holds everything I need!
customer_reviews.author: Ann J. (love to read)

product_meta.title: Polder Style Station - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackPolder Style Station is the ideal storage solution for keeping hair styling tools neat, safe, and clutter-free. Constructed of stainless-steel mesh and a silicone inner base, the Style Station stores hair styling supplies in one, convenient location. Three individual compartments are sized to fit most hair styling tools including dryers, curling irons, straighteners, and brushes. Plus, the rear storage pocket keeps the cords neatly out of the way. This styling tool holder can easily be set on the counter or can be placed inside a drawer or cabinet to keep tools within reach.
feature_bullets: HEAT-RESISTANT MESH AND SILICONE BASE let hot styling tools cool down quickly and safely after use
REAR BIN keeps cords neat and out of the way. Rear cord storage pocket with plug notches keeps cords neat and out of the way
VERSATILE DESIGN works as a freestanding storage solution on the counter, also hangs on towel bars or hooks
DESIGNED TO SAFELY COOL DOWN AND STORE hot styling tools. Please do not use while styling items are turned ON
MEASURES: 9.5 in (L) x 5.75 in (D) x 9.75 in (H)

OVERSIZED OPENINGS fit most styling tools: hair dryers,curling irons, straighteners, brushes and more. Center blow dryer opening is 3” diameter, side curling iron and straightener openings are 2" diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,534 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
